analysis.key_quote: This rule is a blatant power grab by OPM, exceeding its statutory authority under 5 U.S.C. § 1103 and violating the nondelegation doctrine (Gundy v. U.S., 2019).
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the rule by highlighting legal concerns regarding the authority of OPM and the potential violation of civil service laws, indicating a defense of the merit-based system and due process protections.
